title.title: Victoria Bus Station: partial closure Saturday 21 and Sunday 22 June 2008

texts: On Saturday 21 and Sunday 22 June, part of Victoria Bus Station will be closed.
The closures will allow emergency carriageway repair works to be carried out.
The following routes will be affected by the weekend closure: 38, 52, 73, N38, N52 and N73.
The following routes will not be affected by the partial closure; 2, 8, 11, 16, 36, 44, 82, 148, 170, 185, 211, 436, C1, C10, N2, N8, N11, N16, N44, and N136.
Details of diversions and stopping arrangements for the weekend will be available at local bus stops and on the Transport for London website tfl.gov.uk .
Bus station staff will also be available to advise passengers of where to catch their bus.
